## Startup

```{r startup}
library(tRakt)
# Set your credentials via get_trakt_credentials() if not done by package loading
```

## Getting some data

````{r getting data}
show <- trakt.getFullShowData("game of thrones")

knitr::kable(head(show$episodes)[c("epnum", "title", "rating", "votes")])
````
